Flow.description: RRA W-2263 : CLM - Change name and text of Relaunch button
Flow.label: Universign - get transaction Info

fields.name: warningConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
⚠️

Are you sure you want to cancel the signature process ?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_warningConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
⚠️

Are you sure you want to relaunch the ongoing signatory  ?

This process will send a reminder to the signatory who did not sign yet.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_UniversignTransactionStatus_Text
fields.fieldText:
Document Signature Status ✍🏻📨

No document sent for signature .. yet

value.stringValue: Need help to send your final document for signature ?

fields.name: HelpMessage
fields.fieldText: On the left of this page > In the "LightningAgreementActions" section > Click on "Send for signatures"

fields.name: UniversignTransactionStatus_Text
fields.fieldText: Document Signatur﻿e Status ✍🏻📨 ﻿as of {!NOW}

fields.name: SignatureStatusTextDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Signature status: {!SignatureStatus_Formula}

Current Signer: {!Get_transaction_Info.currentSignerName}

Last relaunched on: {!latestTransaction.RelaunchedDate__c}

fields.name: docSentDateText
fields.fieldText: Document sent for signature on {!Get_transaction_Info.universignTransaction.CreatedDate}

fields.name: OppsErrDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Oops.. an error occurred 😟

{!Get_Document_From_Universign.errorMsg}

{!Get_transaction_Info.errorMsg}

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

{!Cancel_universign_transaction.errorMsg}

{!Relaunch_transaction.errorMsg}


Try to click on the Refresh button or try again in a few minutes.


If the error persist please contact your administrator

fields.name: Copy_1_of_SuccessSignatureSigned
fields.fieldText: Your document has been successfully signed by all recipient(s) 🎉🥳

fields.name: NoteWhereToFindTheDoc
fields.fieldText: 💡 You will also find the document in the "Notes & attachment" related list of this agreement record
